channel.title: I got a crazy error i can't fix! please help meeh
channel.description:
I GOT AN ERROR WHILE ATTACKiNG NPCS ON MY SERVER IT USED TO NOT DO IT BUT IDK WHAT MADE IT DO IT! I CAN USE RANGE TO ATTACK ONLY IDK Y MELEE DOESN'T WORK PLEASE HELP! HERES ERROR WHEN MELEE ATTACKING NPC: error with player 2, reigninblood java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 18 at client.AttackNPC(client.java:9386) at client.process(client.java:21246) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:270) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
help me and i will love you all forever lol! this is ticking me off ive been tryn forever to fix this!! i must be dumb or something!

item.title: I got a crazy error i can't fix! please help meeh
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

ollie123:

OH NO IT MEANS THAT AN ARRAY INDEX WAS OUT OF THE BOUNDS OF THE ARRAY OH NO THE WORLD IS GOING TO EXPLODE IF THE SERVER IS NOT FIXED!!!

Ha.

Read full topic
